titles.title: CDQ Community Preservation Act
A bill to amend the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to clarify the status of certain communities in the western Alaska community development quota program.
CDQ Community Preservation Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: CDQ Community Preservation Act - Amends the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to make a community eligible for participation in the western Alaska community development quota (CDQ) program (under which a percentage of the total allowable catch of any Bering Sea fishery is allocated to the program) if the community was: (1) listed in a specified table in the Code of Federal Regulations as eligible to apply for such quota; and (2) approved by the National Marine Fisheries Service on April 19, 1999.
